Quick search

GridPyÂ¶

GridPy is a python-based library of |GridGen| that is developed to assist the user with i/o procedures, utilities and code options/testing. In the following, the commands are listed by category and discussion is provided in each respective section.

  • Compilation Options
    • Configure
    • Compile
  • Setting the path
  • Cleaning commands
  • Plotting Utility
    • Options in the plotting module
    • Using the plotting module
  • Documentation
    • Building
    • Viewing
    • Cleaning
    • Closing Notes
